proyects.title: Magichy
proyects.description: Magichy is my first proyect with react. It's bookshop that have a list of books, you can navigate to their details, add them to the cart and make an order with a form.

proyects.title: DataFilms
proyects.description: Web site of movies information as a preparation for Alkemy's technical screening, you can get details of the movies and add them to a favourite list, also that have a sistem of login with JS web token.

proyects.title: Ave Silver and Crystals
proyects.description: Freelance job for being part of the 10% best students in React JS course of coderhouse. Is a static web that have the products and information of the entrepreneurship.
